data.title: Z Databases
data.text:
The following databases are newly acquired or being evaluated for a future subscription.

Black Thought and Culture This link opens in a new window

New

"Black Thought and Culture is a landmark electronic collection of approximately 100,000 pages of non-fiction writings by major American black leaders—teachers, artists, politicians, religious leaders, athletes, war veterans, entertainers, and other figures—covering 250 years of history."

Environmental History: Conservation and Public Policy in America This link opens in a new window

New

Government documents and papers from activists tracing the history of conservation-related public policy in the United States.

Modules included are:

Conservation and Public Policy in America, 1870-1980

Colonial Policy and Global Development, 1896-1993

Financial Times This link opens in a new window

New

Access to the Financial Times via the web or mobile device.

Note: Signing in. (Click on "more").

Requires a free account. To sign up, click on "Sign In" in the top right corner, then enter your Rice email address. This should take you to a page where you can sign in using your NetID and password. If you have any problems, please email eresources@rice.edu for assistance.

Mail on Sunday This link opens in a new window

New

Archives of the Sunday sister publication to the British newspaper The Daily Mail.

Power to the People: Counterculture, Social Movements, and the Alternative Press This link opens in a new window

New

Publications from alternative and countercultural movements from the nineteenth through twenty-first centuries.

Sunday Times Historical Archive: 2017-2021 Supplement This link opens in a new window

New

Archives of the British newspaper The Sunday Times.
